content: ❗️ free tutorial for size s + the best price & more always on my website https //loopsonly com/products/treble-twirl-skirt unleash your inner fashionista with my treble twirl crochet skirt this easy-level pattern creates a flirty and twirly skirt with elegant wrinkles cascading from a high-waisted band made using the smooth linked treble_crochet stitch for the body and half_double_crochet for the waist it features 4 chic buttons and discreet pockets for functionality sized xs to 2xl and 40 cm in length it s the perfect above-the-knee piece to add to your handmade wardrobe **materials** …yarn drops loves you 8 classic 8/8 cotton color 13 xs 550 / 935 m s 600 g / 1020 m m 750 g / 1275 m l 850 g / 1445 m xl 1050 g / 1785 m 2xl 1150 g / 1955 m …other hook 3 and 5 mm 2 buttons 1 8 cm yarn needle scissors measuring tape stitch markers **gauge** …waist 14 half_double_crochet sts × 20 row = 10x10 cm …body 17 ltc sts x 5 ltc row = 10x10 cm **size chart in cm ** size xs s m l xl 2xl waist 59 75 65 5 73 5 84 94 104 hip 84 75 90 25 99 109 119 25 133 25 **stitch key us terminology ** chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet dcblo = double_crochet in the back loop only half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet yo = yarn over st = stitch sts = stitches slip_stitch = slip_stitch slsts = slip stitches ltc = linked treble_crochet ldc = linked double_crochet rs = right side ws = wrong side **specialty stitch & technique key** as explained in the pattern i use linked double_crochet stitch and linked treble_crochet **notes** the skirt is crocheted vertically first you will make 2 panels then attach the pockets to both panels sew the sides of the skirt and at the end add the button holes the wrong side corresponds to odd-numbered row while the right side aligns with even-numbered row i recommend you watch my youtube tutorial if there are any uncertainties
